title: Coffee Grounds for Bonsai
explanation: Coffee grounds are a good source of nitrogen and a beneficial fertilizer for bonsai.
why: Nitrogen boosts the growth of the bonsai.

title: Eggshells for Bonsai
explanation: Eggshells provide calcium and improve soil quality.
why: Calcium helps the bonsai to be stronger.

title: Detection of Yellow Leaves
explanation: A yellow leaf can indicate an excess of water or a lack of nutrients.
why: Yellow leaves are a symptom of a potential problem.
warnings: Check the soil humidity before watering.
